plot: An emotionally lost man ruled by alcohol addiction attempts to regain control of his life for his lover, however the tide of the world seems to be swallowing his desire whole.
title: Petla
plot_es: An emotionally lost man ruled by alcohol addiction attempts to regain control of his life for his lover, however the tide of the world seems to be swallowing his desire whole.
plot_en: An emotionally lost man ruled by alcohol addiction attempts to regain control of his life for his lover, however the tide of the world seems to be swallowing his desire whole.
